channel.title: Whip Special attack

item.title: Whip Special attack
item.dc:creator: @mrbob1219 mrbob1219
item.description:
@mrbob1219 wrote:

Here is part of my whip special but its really pissing me off because when i use the spec it makes it look like its being used on me and i dont want it to look like thatâ€¦

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount >= 50) {//whip gfx100(341); weapontimer = server.WeaponHandler.WeaponSpeed(GetItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])); calculateSpecial(); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit + 10); usingSpecial = false; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; startAnimation(1658);

But when i use this code here i dont even see the graphic that happens

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount >= 50) {//whip stillgfx(341, enemyX, enemyY); weapontimer = server.WeaponHandler.WeaponSpeed(GetItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])); calculateSpecial(); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit + 10); usingSpecial = false; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; startAnimation(1658);
}
can someone help me please? }

Read full topic
